code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import userReducer from'./user/user.reducer';import cartReducer from'./cart/cart.reducer';import shopReducer from'./shop/shop.reducer';import directoryReducer from'./directory/directory.reducer';import authReducer from'./reducers/authReducer';import errorReducer from'./reducers/errorReducer';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage,whitelist:['cart','user']};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,shop:shopReducer,directory:directoryReducer,auth:authReducer,errors:errorReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
